Title: Register Account
Description: As a prospective user, I want to register an account so that I can access the club management system. Acceptance Criteria: User can input email, password, and basic profile information; System validates email format and password strength (e.g., minimum 8 characters); User receives a confirmation email with a verification link; Verified users can log in after registration.

Title: Log In to Account
Description: As a registered user, I want to log in to my account so that I can access system features. Acceptance Criteria: User can log in with email and password; System displays an error for invalid credentials; Session persists until logout or timeout (e.g., 24 hours).

Title: Log Out of Account
Description: As a logged-in user, I want to log out so that my session is securely terminated. Acceptance Criteria: User can log out via a button or menu option; System ends the session and redirects to the login page.

Title: Reset Password
Description: As a user, I want to reset my password so that I can regain access if I forget my credentials. Acceptance Criteria: User can request a password reset via email; System sends a secure reset link valid for 24 hours; User can set a new password meeting strength requirements.

Title: Update Account Information
Description: As a user, I want to update my account information so that my profile remains accurate. Acceptance Criteria: User can edit name, email, phone, or other profile details; System validates updated information (e.g., email format); Changes are saved and reflected across the system.

Title: Delete Account
Description: As a user, I want to delete my account so that my data is removed from the system. Acceptance Criteria: User can request account deletion with confirmation prompt; System removes all user data per privacy regulations; User is logged out and cannot log in again.

Title: Filter/Search Clubs
Description: As a user, I want to filter or search for clubs so that I can find clubs that match my interests. Acceptance Criteria: User can search by club name, category, or location; System displays filtered results with basic club details; Results are sortable by relevance or name.

Title: View Club Information
Description: As a user, I want to view detailed club information so that I can learn about its activities and purpose. Acceptance Criteria: Club page displays description, contact info, and member count; User can view upcoming events and recruitment campaigns; Information is accessible without membership.

Title: Create Recruitment Campaign
Description: As a club admin, I want to create a recruitment campaign so that new members can join the club. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can set campaign details (e.g., start/end date, requirements); Campaign is visible to users on the club’s page; System notifies admins when new applications are submitted.

Title: View Recruitment Campaign Details
Description: As a user, I want to view details of a club’s recruitment campaign so that I can decide to apply. Acceptance Criteria: Campaign page shows description, dates, and application process; Users can access the application form directly.

Title: Apply to Join Club
Description: As a user, I want to apply to join a club so that I can become a member. Acceptance Criteria: User can submit an application form with required details; System confirms submission and notifies the applicant; Application is visible to club admins for review.

Title: Review and Approve Applications
Description: As a club admin, I want to review and approve membership applications so that I can manage club membership. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can view a list of applications with applicant details; Admin can approve or reject applications with comments; Applicants are notified of the decision via email or in-system notification.

Title: Track Recruitment Campaign Statistics
Description: As a club admin, I want to view recruitment campaign statistics so that I can assess its success. Acceptance Criteria: System displays metrics (e.g., number of applications, approvals); Admin can filter stats by campaign or date range; Data is exportable as a CSV file.

Title: Edit Recruitment Campaign
Description: As a club admin, I want to edit a recruitment campaign so that I can update its details or status. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can modify campaign details (e.g., dates, description); Changes are reflected immediately for users; System logs changes for audit purposes.

Title: Receive Club Application Result Notification
Description: As a user, I want to receive a notification about my club application result so that I know my membership status. Acceptance Criteria: User receives an email or in-system notification with the result; Notification includes reasons for rejection, if applicable.

Title: View Club Member Information
Description: As a club admin, I want to view member information so that I can manage the club roster. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can view a list of members with details (e.g., name, role); List is filterable and sortable.

Title: Remove Club Member
Description: As a club admin, I want to remove a member so that I can update the club roster. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can select a member and confirm removal; Member is notified of removal via email or in-system notification; Member loses access to club-specific features.

Title: Change Member Role
Description: As a club admin, I want to change a member’s role so that I can assign appropriate permissions. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can assign roles (e.g., member, organizer, admin); Role changes update permissions immediately; Member is notified of the role change.

Title: Update Club Information
Description: As a club admin, I want to update club information so that it remains accurate and relevant. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can edit club description, contact info, or logo; Changes are reflected on the club’s public page; System logs updates for audit purposes.

Title: Filter/Search Events
Description: As a user, I want to filter or search for events so that I can find events of interest. Acceptance Criteria: User can search by event name, date, or club; System displays filtered results with basic event details; Results are sortable by date or relevance.

Title: View Event Information
Description: As a user, I want to view detailed event information so that I can decide to participate. Acceptance Criteria: Event page displays date, location, description, and organizer details; User can view participation requirements and ticket information.

Title: Create Event
Description: As a club admin, I want to create an event so that members and users can participate. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can set event details (e.g., date, location, description); Event is visible to users on the club’s page or event directory; System notifies members of the new event.

Title: Join Event as Organizer
Description: As a club member, I want to join an event as an organizer so that I can help manage it. Acceptance Criteria: Member can request to join as an organizer; Admin approves or rejects the request; Approved organizers gain access to event management tools.

Title: Register for Event
Description: As a user, I want to register for an event so that I can participate. Acceptance Criteria: User can register via an event-specific form; System confirms registration and issues a ticket (if applicable); Registration is visible to event organizers.

Title: Mark Event as Interested
Description: As a user, I want to mark an event as interested so that I can track it for later. Acceptance Criteria: User can mark an event with a single click; System saves the event to the user’s “Interested” list; User receives notifications for event updates.

Title: Edit Event Information
Description: As an event organizer, I want to edit event details so that I can keep information accurate. Acceptance Criteria: Organizer can modify event date, location, or description; Changes are reflected immediately for users; System notifies registered users of updates.

Title: View Event Participants
Description: As an event organizer, I want to view the list of participants so that I can manage attendance. Acceptance Criteria: Organizer can view a list of registered participants; List includes participant names and contact details (if permitted); List is exportable as a CSV file.

Title: Request Event Budget
Description: As an event organizer, I want to request a budget for an event so that I can cover expenses. Acceptance Criteria: Organizer can submit a budget request with itemized expenses; Admin receives and reviews the request; System tracks request status (e.g., Pending, Approved, Rejected).

Title: Approve Event Budget
Description: As a club admin, I want to approve or reject event budget requests so that I can manage club finances. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can view budget details and approve/reject with comments; Organizer is notified of the decision; Approved budgets are added to financial tracking.

Title: Track Event Progress
Description: As an event organizer, I want to track event preparation progress so that I can ensure timely completion. Acceptance Criteria: Organizer can view a checklist of tasks (e.g., venue booked, materials ready); System allows updating task statuses; Progress is visible to all organizers.

Title: View Event Participation History
Description: As a user, I want to view my event participation history so that I can track my involvement. Acceptance Criteria: User can view a list of past events attended; List includes event name, date, and role (e.g., participant, organizer).

Title: View Past Event Details
Description: As a user, I want to view details of events I attended so that I can recall information. Acceptance Criteria: User can access past event pages with full details; System indicates if the event is archived.

Title: View Event Ticket
Description: As a registered user, I want to view my event ticket so that I can present it for entry. Acceptance Criteria: User can view a digital ticket with event details and QR code; Ticket is accessible via email or user profile.

Title: Receive Event Interest Notifications
Description: As a user, I want to receive notifications for events I marked as interested so that I stay updated. Acceptance Criteria: User receives updates for event changes or reminders; Notifications are sent via email or in-system; User can opt out of notifications.

Title: Receive Event Participation Reminders
Description: As a registered user, I want to receive reminders for events I’m attending so that I don’t miss them. Acceptance Criteria: System sends reminders (e.g., 24 hours before the event); Reminders include event details and ticket access; User can customize reminder settings.

Title: Contribute to Club Fund
Description: As a club member, I want to contribute to the club fund so that I can support club activities. Acceptance Criteria: Member can submit a payment via integrated payment gateway; System records the contribution and updates financial records; Member receives a confirmation of payment.

Title: Pay Event Participation Fee
Description: As a user, I want to pay an event participation fee so that I can attend the event. Acceptance Criteria: User can pay via integrated payment gateway during registration; System confirms payment and issues a ticket; Payment is recorded in financial tracking.

Title: Track Event Financials
Description: As an event organizer, I want to track event income and expenses so that I can manage the budget. Acceptance Criteria: System displays total income (e.g., ticket sales) and expenses; Organizer can filter by event or date range; Data is exportable as a CSV file.

Title: Track Club Financials by Period
Description: As a club admin, I want to track club income and expenses by period so that I can monitor financial health. Acceptance Criteria: System displays financial summary by month, quarter, or year; Admin can view contributions, event fees, and expenses; Data is exportable as a CSV file.

Title: Export Financial Report as PDF
Description: As a club admin, I want to export a financial report as a PDF so that I can share it with stakeholders. Acceptance Criteria: System generates a PDF with income, expenses, and balance; Report includes club name, period, and date generated; PDF is downloadable and shareable.

Title: View Club Fund Contribution History
Description: As a club admin, I want to view the club’s fund contribution history so that I can track member contributions. Acceptance Criteria: System displays a list of contributions with member names and amounts; List is filterable by date or member.

Title: Post Internal Activity
Description: As a club admin, I want to post an internal activity so that members are informed of club updates. Acceptance Criteria: Admin can create a post with text, images, or attachments; Post is visible only to club members; Members receive a notification of the new post.

Title: Receive New Activity Notifications
Description: As a club member, I want to receive notifications for new activities so that I stay updated. Acceptance Criteria: Member receives notifications via email or in-system; Notifications include a summary of the activity; Member can opt out of notifications.
